EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Used to notify the Customer when the Awaiting Collection event message is created
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW Awaiting Collection
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your item {!Case.ReferenceID__c} is now awaiting collection
Your item is ready for collection {!IF(ISPICKVAL(Case.ProductSubCategory__c, 'Registered Post International'),'',', please click here: https://auspost.com.au/mypost/track/#/search to confirm its current location')}.It will be held with Australia Post for 10 business days.
It is recommended you also bring Photo ID. For instructions on how to collect your item, please see here.
If you have any further questions about the delivery of your item, please reply to this email and we will be happy to assist you.
Thank you,
Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
